subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han simp|蠭}}. {{Han compound|虫|t1=insect|夆|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a kind of insect.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Cognate with {{cog|bo|བུང་བ||bee}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). {{zh-ref|STEDT}} lists {{lang|zh|蜂}} as a Chinese comparandum under its {{inh|zh|sit-pro|-}} root {{m|sit-pro|*pljum||bee, wasp}}.

May be ultimately of onomatopoeic origin. Compare {{cog|mkh-pro|*huŋ|*ʔu(ə)ŋ ~ hu(ə)ŋ|bee, wasp, hornet}}, whence {{cog|vi|ong||bee}}.
